#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod=1e9+7;

#define fileinput freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fileoutput freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define T ll t ; cin>>t ; while(t--)

int main()
{
   T{
        string s,d;
        cin>>d>>s;

        if(s.length() < d.length()){
            string p=s;
            s=d;
            d=p;
        }

        ll ans=1e9;
        ll mn=0;

        for(ll i=0;i<s.length();i++){
            mn=0;
            for(ll j=0;j<d.length();j++){
                if(d[j]!=s[i+j]) mn++;
            }
            ans=min(ans,mn);
        }

        printf("%lld\n",ans);
   }

    return 0;
}
